--- Testing vaddps (packed single-precision addition) ---
--- 128-bit normal values ---
Input1: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input2: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Result : 2.000000 4.000000 6.000000 8.000000 
Hex   : 0x40000000 0x40800000 0x40C00000 0x41000000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit normal values ---
Input1: 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 4.500000 
Input2: 0.500000 1.500000 2.500000 3.500000 
Result : 2.000000 4.000000 6.000000 8.000000 
Hex   : 0x40000000 0x40800000 0x40C00000 0x41000000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values ---
Input1: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Result : 1.000000 -1.000000 inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x3F800000 0xBF800000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values ---
Input1: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 
Result : 1.000000 -1.000000 inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x3F800000 0xBF800000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values 2 ---
Input1: inf inf -inf -inf 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : inf inf -inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x7F800000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit boundary values 2 ---
Input1: inf inf -inf -inf 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : inf inf -inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x7F800000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan 1.000000 -1.000000 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 nan -nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan 1.000000 -1.000000 
Input2: 1.000000 -1.000000 nan -nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: nan -nan -nan nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 2 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: nan -nan -nan nan 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 3 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit NaN tests 3 ---
Input1: nan -nan nan -nan 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 -0.000000 
Result : nan -nan nan -nan 
Hex   : 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 0x7FC00000 0xFFC00000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit memory operand (reg-mem) ---
Input1: 10.000000 20.000000 30.000000 40.000000 
Input2: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result : 10.100000 20.200001 30.299999 40.400002 
Hex   : 0x4121999A 0x41A1999A 0x41F26666 0x4221999A 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit memory operand (reg-mem) ---
Input1: 10.000000 20.000000 30.000000 40.000000 
Input2: 0.100000 0.200000 0.300000 0.400000 
Result : 10.100000 20.200001 30.299999 40.400002 
Hex   : 0x4121999A 0x41A1999A 0x41F26666 0x4221999A 
--- End of test ---

--- Denormal values (128-bit) ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 3.000000 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x40400000 
--- End of test ---

--- Denormal values (128-bit) ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 1.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 2.000000 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 3.000000 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x40400000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit special: 0.0f combinations 1 ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit special: 0.0f combinations 1 ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input2: 0.000000 -0.000000 inf -inf 
Result : 0.000000 0.000000 inf -inf 
Hex   : 0x00000000 0x00000000 0x7F800000 0xFF800000 
--- End of test ---

--- 128-bit special: 0.0f combinations 2 ---
Input1: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input2: nan -nan 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 
Result : nan -nan 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000

Input2: nan -nan 340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000 -340282346638528859811704183484516925440.000000
